Well i haven't know the story of Bioshock Infinite. i watched Cryotic's walkthrough on YouTube since 2017 and i never got to finished it.

Now in July 2020, i won a Wallpaper Competition from PigmanMovie and i won a prize $8 Steam Wallet Gift Card i bought 2 games which is only for $3 games or on sale. I bought Bioshock Infinite for $3 and i wanted to finish this game and i wanted to know the truth about Elizabeth and Booker. 

I gave this game, 9.8 / 10. i will play this game again if have the good gaming computer to stream on and i will show my friends about the Tale of Colombia.

It's a great game. I just don't like how overpowered the Handymen are. On hard mode they take nearly all your health in one hit, and they are the most mobile and the fastest enemy in the game. You can't dodge them either. They should be a lot slower, and have a lot less range on their jumps. They reach you within seconds while you could be on the other side of the map, plus they have so much health that the ammount of bullets you're carrying isn't enough to kill them, even with vigors.
 But everything else in the game is great.

Just an all around incredible experience. It runs great, looks beautiful, the gameplay is fun, the story is engaging, the atmosphere and setting add so much, and the acting is amazing. Definitely recommend that you at least play BioShock 1 first, and maybe 2, before playing this. It's not required if you want to enjoy Infinite but it certainly helps. Long story short, play this trilogy please. God bless.
